Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Unturned \Un*turned"\, a. [Pref. un- + turned.] Not turned; not revolved or reversed. [1913 Webster]
{To leave no stone unturned}, to leave nothing untried for accomplishing one's purpose. [1913 Webster]
[He] left unturned no stone To make my guilt appear, and hide his own. --Dryden. [1913 Webster]
unturned adj : not turned; "left no stone unturned" [ant: {turned}]
